data.name: ClarityTracker
data.value: SCN Clarity Tracker

data.name: ClarityTracker description
data.value: Invisible control that initializes Microsoft Clarity and sends optional metadata.

data.name: clarityProjectId_DisplayName
data.value: Clarity Project Id

data.name: trackingAllowed_DisplayName
data.value: Tracking Allowed

data.name: userId_DisplayName
data.value: User Id

data.name: userEmail_DisplayName
data.value: User Email

data.name: userName_DisplayName
data.value: User Name

data.name: sessionId_DisplayName
data.value: Session Id

data.name: screenName_DisplayName
data.value: Screen Name

data.name: appName_DisplayName
data.value: App Name

data.name: environment_DisplayName
data.value: Environment

data.name: eventName_DisplayName
data.value: Event Name

data.name: eventDataJson_DisplayName
data.value: Event Data (JSON)

data.name: eventTriggerToken_DisplayName
data.value: Event Trigger Token

data.name: sessionTagsJson_DisplayName
data.value: Session Tags (JSON)

data.name: disable_DisplayName
data.value: Disable

data.name: debugLogging_DisplayName
data.value: Debug Logging

data.name: clarityProjectId_Description
data.value: Required. Clarity project ID used to load the Clarity script.

data.name: trackingAllowed_Description
data.value: Optional privacy gate. When false, Clarity is not initialized. Defaults to true if not bound.

data.name: userId_Description
data.value: Optional. Defaults to the current user id in model-driven apps when available.

data.name: userEmail_Description
data.value: Optional. No automatic default in Canvas apps. Bind User().Email if you need it.

data.name: userName_Description
data.value: Optional. Defaults to current user name in model-driven apps when available.

data.name: sessionId_Description
data.value: Optional. Defaults to a generated GUID per browser tab. Bind Host.SessionId if you want app-level sessions.

data.name: screenName_Description
data.value: Optional. Defaults to URL path/hash. Only changes are tracked after initialization. Bind a variable updated on each screen to get Canvas screen names.

data.name: appName_Description
data.value: Optional. Defaults to a name derived from the URL. Bind App.Name for clarity.

data.name: environment_Description
data.value: Optional. Environment label such as DEV, TEST, PROD. If not set, a best-effort value is derived from the host name.

data.name: eventName_Description
data.value: Optional. Name of the Clarity custom event to send when Event Trigger Token changes.

data.name: eventDataJson_Description
data.value: Optional. JSON payload for the custom event. Leave empty for events without data.

data.name: eventTriggerToken_Description
data.value: Optional. When this numeric value changes, the control sends the current Event Name and Event Data (JSON) to Clarity as a custom event.

data.name: sessionTagsJson_Description
data.value: Optional. JSON object of session tags, e.g. { "appType": "Canvas", "env": "DEV" }. Applied once per session.

data.name: disable_Description
data.value: Optional technical switch. When true, Clarity is not initialized. Defaults to false.

data.name: debugLogging_Description
data.value: Optional. When true, writes debug information to the browser console under [SCN.ClarityTracker]. Defaults to false.
